name: Virgin Brazilian Curly
description:
100% Virgin Brazilian Curly
Please care for this hair as you would care for your own hair. Use deep conditioners as well as leave in conditioners. I suggest organix products. Use a sulfate free shampoo. Weft sealer is good to help keep shedding down over time. The hair has little to no shedding and tangeling. Keep the hair mouisturized as dry brittle hair can cause the hair to be unhealthy.
Use a heat protector when styling with heat.
natural colors

name: Virgin Peruvian Hair Straight

Please care for this hair as you would care for your own hair. Use deep conditioners as well as leave in conditioners. I suggest mixed chicks products. Use a sulfate free shampoo. Use a heat protector when styling with heat.

name: Virgin Brazilian bodywave deals with matching Closure
Custom Color
description: Custom color does cost extra. Unlike the ombre custom color is all over color. Starting at $25per bundle. If you are getting custom color for all bundles you will need to add that to your cart 3times for 3bundles etc!! Please choose the correct quantity , 1 will only cover one bundle instead of 3 If you would like custom color add the selection to your cart when purchasing your hair. Please make sure you add to your cart before checking out. Choose the color choices below, if the color you desire is not listed please choose other and email us the picture of the desired color. We do recommend sending pictures in of the desired color as there are many shades. PLEASE NOTE the color may very slightly and will not be exactly identical to a celebs picture etc. All colors are custom using non damaging products so that you may recolor the hair in the future. Once you place your order we will email you for any questions about your color etc. BeautyLamour@gmail.com ALL SALES ARE FINAL!!! ESPECIALLY CUSTOM ORDERS AND REGULAR ORDERS. NO RETURNS OR EXCHANGES OR REFUNDS! NO EXCUSES AND NO EXCEPTIONS.

options.name: OTHER NOT LISTED (send note or email if choosing this)

name: Ombre Service
description: We offer ombre service. When purchasing hair from us if you would like your hair to have the ombre effect add it to your cart. Also when checking out write us a note on the colors and details of how you would like your ombre. We can do any color. Or you can email us the details and attach a picture if you like at BeautyLamour@gmail.com. Pricing is per bundle. So if you are purchasing 3bundles and you wish to have ombre service on all 3 bundles you would have to add it to your cart accordingly. We can do one color ombre's such as if your have black hair the one color can be blonde. or 2colors your black can fade to brown and then blonde on the ends, etc. Please choose accordingly.
